title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.3 - Compliance with traffic control devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.3 - Compliance with traffic control devices

State Regulations

Every person shall obey the instructions of any applicable
traffic control device, unless otherwise directed by an authority
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
